title: feat: Add proxy support for browser automation.
body: feat: Add proxy support for browser automation and fix TypeError: MessageManager.__init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'tool_call_in_content'
author: qitest

comments.body:
feat: Add proxy support for browser automation and fix TypeError: MessageManager.init() got an unexpected keyword argument 'tool_call_in_content'. 

This is not an error. Please upgrade to browser-use>=0.1.18

> feat: Add proxy support for browser automation and fix TypeError: MessageManager.init() got an unexpected keyword argument 'tool_call_in_content'.
> 
> This is not an error. Please upgrade to browser-use>=0.1.18

Thanks for the suggestion. I've upgraded to browser-use>=0.1.18

satisfaction_conditions: Implementation must maintain compatibility with browser-use>=0.1.18 package requirements
Proxy support implementation must not introduce initialization errors in MessageManager class
Solution must provide functional browser automation proxy support

_classification.category: Can be dockerized without any issue
